_description: A paraphrase of St. Bernard’s lines: ‘Aspicias capud inclinatum’, etc. with the Latin and French texts — five couplets

BLAdd11579.First Lines:
Man folwe seint Bernardes traceAnd loke in Ihesucristes
                    face…
BLAdd11579.Last Lines:
…Al hes bodi es don on rodeSenful man for þyne
                    goode
